package Frame;
import java.awt.Desktop;
import java.awt.HeadlessException;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.URI;
import java.net.URISyntaxException;
import java.sql.*;
import javax.swing.*;
import koneksi.Koneksi;

public class Login extends javax.swing.JFrame {
    Connection conn= Koneksi.getKoneksi();
    ResultSet rs = null;
    PreparedStatement pst = null;

    private void userActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                    

    private void passwordActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void loginMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                   
        String sql = "select * from login where username = ? and password= ?";
     try{
        pst = conn.prepareStatement(sql);
        pst.setString(1, user.getText());
        pst.setString(2, String.valueOf(password.getPassword()));
        rs=pst.executeQuery();
        if (user.getText().equals("")){
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "Jangan Lupa Isi Username ya !!");
            user.requestFocus();
        }
        else if(password.getText().equals("")){
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "Jangan Lupa Isi Password ya !!");
        }
        else if(rs.next()){
            Login nu = new Login();
            nu.setVisible(false);
            new Dashboard().show();
            this.dispose();
        }
        else {
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "password atau username salah");
        }
        }catch (HeadlessException | SQLException e){   
     }
    }                                  

    private void instagramMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                       
        Desktop browser = Desktop.getDesktop();
      try{
      browser.browse(new URI("https://www.instagram.com/smart_aquaponics/?hl=en"));
      }catch(IOException | URISyntaxException er){ 
      }
    }                                      

    private void fbMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                
        Desktop browser = Desktop.getDesktop();
      try{
      browser.browse(new URI("https://www.facebook.com/SmartAquaponics/reviews/?ref=page_internal"));
      }catch(IOException er){
      } catch (URISyntaxException ex) {}
    }                               

    private void igMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                
      Desktop browser = Desktop.getDesktop();
      try{
      browser.browse(new URI("https://www.instagram.com/smart_aquaponics/?hl=en"));
      }catch(IOException | URISyntaxException er){ 
      }
    }
